sections.label: Urban/Wastewater virome
sections.query: (virome OR "viral metagenomics") AND (wastewater OR sewage OR "built environment" OR urban)

sections.label: Metagenomics methods
sections.query: metagenomics AND (benchmark* OR pipeline OR "quality control" OR assembly OR classification)

items.title: Genomic analysis of the genetic background underlying Streptococcus pneumoniae beta-lactam nonsusceptibility in central Vietnam: increased beta-lactam nonsusceptibility and dynamics of the pbp2x gene.
items.authors: Hiroshi Fujii, Mitsuhiko Sato, Hien Anh Thi Nguyen, Huong Thi Thu Vu, Satoshi Kakiuchi, Bhim Gopal Dhoubhadel
items.abstract_snippet: We previously reported alarmingly high carriage rates of Streptococcus pneumoniae (SP) serotype 19F and serogroup 6 isolates, which were not susceptible to multiple beta-lactams among children under five years of age in Vietnam. Multilocus sequence typing anal…

items.title: ViralQuest: a user-friendly interactive pipeline for viral-sequences analysis and curation.
items.authors: Gabriel Victor Pina Rodrigues, Lucas Yago Melo Ferreira, Eric Roberto Guimarães Rocha Aguiar

items.title: Molar-Incisor and Generalized Grade C Periodontitis: Distinct Microbiome-Immune Interactions Suggest Divergent Pathogenesis.
items.authors: Camila S Stolf, Hélvis E S Paz, Murilo C Paraluppi, Manuela M V Miguel, Mauro P Santamaria, Mabelle F Monteiro
items.abstract_snippet: Molar-Incisor (PerioC-MIP) and Generalized (PerioC-G) Grade C Periodontitis could have distinctive etiopathogenesis behind their unique clinical patterns. Thus, this study aimed to distinguish these two phenotypes by analyzing the subgingival metagenomic profi…

items.title: Shaping soil fungal communities: How swine waste treatment systems and geography drive fungal community shifts.
items.authors: Camila Diehl, Gabriela Merker Breyer, Mariana Costa Torres, Camila Rosana Wuaden, Raquel Rebelatto, Janaina Pastore
items.journal: The Science of the total environment
items.abstract_snippet: The use of swine waste as an organic fertilizer is an important practice in sustainable agriculture. This study aims to evaluate the effects of two common swine waste treatment systems, Covered Lagoon Biodigesters (CLB) and Waste Stabilization Ponds (WSP), on …

items.title: ContigPolishing: A User-Friendly Java GUI for contig extension and refinement in prokaryotic genomes.
items.authors: Rosyely da Silva Oliveira, Nilson César Oliveira Alves Filho, Walter de Barros Gomes Netto, Denis de Castro Silva, Mônica Silva de Oliveira, Ana Carolina Favacho Miranda de Oliveira
items.abstract_snippet: To determine the gene content of an organism, the reads generated by the sequencing process must be assembled using an assembly strategy, either by reference or de novo. However, this process often results in multiple sequences called contigs, which, after the…

sections.label: Influenza evolution
sections.query: (influenza OR flu) AND (evolution OR "positive selection" OR "antigenic drift" OR clade)

items.title: Longitudinal Surveillance of Influenza A Virus Exposure in Wild Boars (Sus scrofa) in Spain (2015-2023): Serologic and Virologic Evidence of Subtype Infections and H5N1 Spillover Risk.
items.authors: Paloma Encinas, Aitor Nogales, Estela Escribano-Romero, M Ángeles Martín Del Burgo, Jorge Ramón López-Olvera, José Enrique Granados
items.abstract_snippet: Influenza A viruses (IAVs) are responsible for respiratory infections in a wide range of species, including birds, swine and humans. The role of wild boar (Sus scrofa) in IAV epidemiology remains underexplored. Here, we present a longitudinal serologic and vir…

items.title: Spatial patterns and environmental influences of COVID-19 outbreaks, post-Omicron.
items.abstract_snippet: The seasonality of many respiratory pathogen outbreaks, such as influenza and respiratory syncytial virus, is driven by climate factors, such as specific humidity or temperature. However, it remains unclear whether climate plays a role in determining the seaso…
